attributes.action: Fast-track the building of hospitals for the increasing COVID 19 patients.
attributes.additional_details: Because the NHS will struggle to cope with the resources it currently has with the increasing number of patients requiring hospitalisation and intensive care treatment over the coming weeks and months.
attributes.background: Fast track the building of hospitals.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has taken the action you wanted to see happen. 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:
 
NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
 
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
